episodes.title: Ep 2: Heavy Meddling With Charity Navalesi
episodes.description:
Ladies, Theydies, and Gentlefriends, we present: OUR FIRST GUEST! She is an incomparable multidisciplinary artist, she is the WICKedly talented host of the podcast “Oops I’m In A Cult!” She is the one and only: Charity Navalesi.  Join us as we cackle, weep, hyperventilate, and emotionally regulate our way through topics like: 

* The search for healthy healing tools 
* Navigating pesky attachment patterns
* Rock bottom’s bottom 
* Sweatin’ it out for Jesus 
* Where not to put garlic 

CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Abuse, High Control Environments/Relationships, Narcissistic Abuse and Manipulation, Inscrutable Sexual Analogies, Heavy Meddling, Garlic Snatch

episodes.title: Ep 1: The Disappointment Begins
episodes.description:
In our very exciting first episode, we'll be giving you, dear listener, some context on who we are, what the heck this show is, and why we can't stop crying at the grocery store! (It’s the trauma.) Tune in to hear us ramble on about all of this and more as we discuss:
The cult from whence we cameLeaving a harmful environment and the messy feelings that followThe power of sharing stories, even the painful onesThe all-too-relatable story of getting groped in the Pope Room at Bucca Di Beppo   (You know the one)
CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Sexual and Physical Abuse, Childhood Sexual Abuse, Religious and Spiritual Abuse, Bucca Di Beppo
